title: i installed skyrim on my laptop
body: had it years ago for 360.  having a blast playing it again, but i have a question.  how come i can run skyrim on medium 60fps, but league on low i am getting fps drops to sometimes as low as 12?  it makes no sense.  at the start of every game i have 120 fps.  at the end im lucky to have 30.  like, wtf.  ive never played a game that does that besides league.  worst programming ever.
